message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's valued at $12,000 to you, and we're offering it to you today at a special price of $10,000. This is an exclusive opportunity to own a product that has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience with our product. If you have any questions or need more information, feel free to ask. We look forward to serving you.
